text_block_list.text:
I tried to catch up, but I lost sight of her in no time. 
Can't expect to outpace an Umamusume. 
But I couldn't bring myself to abandon her.

Her excitement turned against her, making her incredibly late, 
she messed up at practice, and despite her best intentions, the 
drinks and towels she offered were a complete failure...

I was worried. 
I searched the area around the school for about half an hour――
Huff, huff, huff, huff...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Next time... I'll run well... 
I'll be more helpful to Opera O-san...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I'll put on a good race at the meet... Then one day, I can also... 
...................! One more lap...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Taaaaaahhhhhhh!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She wiped off her puffy eyes, and started running along the 
riverbank with all her might――
(THUNK!)
Hweeehhhhhh!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Falling right into the ditch.
That was dangeroush... Thang you for shabing me... shniff...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I'm okay... I'm used to it... Sigh...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Her clothes were all dirty, and it was already so late. 
I assumed she'd want to call it for the night, and I was about to 
suggest that she head back to the dorm――

...I have to work harder...! 
Okay. I'm going off on a long-distance run...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, s-s-sorry...! Am I... causing trouble for you...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=35>I was thinking more that you're a hard worker.</size>

text_block_list.text:
N-no...! I'm not a hard worker, that's not it, I really just, um, 
don't know when to give up.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Whenever I feel like giving up, I start to remember... 
And remembering always makes me drag my useless self back 
up...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Huh...? Um, well... It's not really much to talk about, but――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
This was back when I saw my first GI race... 
All those shining Umamusume, running such a shining race...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
At first I thought a clumsy dope like me could never be part of 
their world... I felt like I was totally different from them... 
But the winner said――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I used to think I couldn't do anything right. I didn't have any 
confidence in myself. But winning races helped me learn to love 
that self.
text_block_list.name: GI Umamusume

text_block_list.text: And now, I especially love myself for running, and winning...!
text_block_list.name: GI Umamusume

text_block_list.text:
If I also work really, really hard... 
Maybe I can change, just like she did...
text_block_list.name: Little Doto

text_block_list.text:
So, I got caught up in the moment, took Tracen Academy's 
entrance exam... And managed to pass, haha...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ...I'm a klutz and bad at everything I do, but I just can't give up...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I think, if I keep trying, one day I might be able to change like 
she did... I might even get to be as confident as Opera O-san.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I can't stop thinking like this, and it keeps me from stopping... 
You already know I'm clumsy, and now I sound stupid, too, don't 
I...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She was already negative to begin with, and it looked like that 
negativity was starting to spiral. But――

The fact of the matter was, despite everything she'd been 
through, she was still putting in her best effort to prepare for the 
Race Meet.

Wh... A, a strength...? 
S-s-sorry, I must have misheard you, right...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=36>Not knowing when to give up is your strength.</size>
<size=36>Not knowing when to give up is your strength.</size>

text_block_list.text: I heard you right!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Uh, d-d-d-do you really think so...? 
No, I really just- just don't know what to do with myself, really, 
that's all...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=41>It takes a lot to be as persistent as you.</size>

text_block_list.text: It... does...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
............. 
...Ehehe. I'm happy to hear that...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
――So, um, I'm going to, well... I really want to run some more 
before heading back...! Good night...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
As I watched her run off, I could see in her, however faint, the 
traces of a strength that I'd never seen before.
Huff... Huff....! ....Okay...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
